images.copyright: Manatees, Crystal River, Florida (© Gregory Sweeney/Getty Images)
images.title: Snuggling sea cows
images.caption: Manatee Appreciation Day
images.desc: Today is Manatee Appreciation Day and, given their sweet and friendly nature, it's hard not to love them. These gentle giants slowly graze through rivers and coastal waters for up to seven hours a day, eating seagrasses and other aquatic plants. They do have teeth, but fear not, they are flat molars used for grinding up vegetation.
